verses.text_plain: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is;
verses.verse_html:
1O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is; ▼
▼ thirsty: Heb. weary
 , ▼
▼ where…: without water

verses.text_plain: To see thy power and thy glory, so as I have seen thee in the sanctuary.
verses.verse_html: 2To see thy power and thy glory, so as I have seen thee in the sanctuary.

verses.text_plain: Because thy lovingkindness is better than life, my lips shall praise thee.
verses.verse_html: 3Because thy lovingkindness is better than life, my lips shall praise thee.

verses.text_plain: Thus will I bless thee while I live: I will lift up my hands in thy name.
verses.verse_html: 4Thus will I bless thee while I live: I will lift up my hands in thy name.

verses.text_plain: My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness; and my mouth shall praise thee with joyful lips:
verses.verse_html:
5My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness; and my mouth shall praise thee with joyful lips: ▼
▼ marrow: Heb. fatness

verses.text_plain: When I remember thee upon my bed, and meditate on thee in the night watches.
verses.verse_html: 6When I remember thee upon my bed, and meditate on thee in the night watches.

verses.text_plain: Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.
verses.verse_html: 7Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.

tokens.text: Because thou hast been my help

verses.text_plain: My soul followeth hard after thee: thy right hand upholdeth me.
verses.verse_html: 8My soul followeth hard after thee: thy right hand upholdeth me.

verses.text_plain: But those that seek my soul, to destroy it, shall go into the lower parts of the earth.
verses.verse_html: 9But those that seek my soul, to destroy it, shall go into the lower parts of the earth.

verses.text_plain: They shall fall by the sword: they shall be a portion for foxes.
verses.verse_html:
10They shall fall by the sword: they shall be a portion for foxes. ▼
▼ They shall fall…: Heb. They shall make him run out like water by the hands of

footnotes.body_text: ▼ They shall fall…: Heb. They shall make him run out like water by the hands of
footnotes.body_html: ▼ They shall fall…: Heb. They shall make him run out like water by the hands of

verses.text_plain: But the king shall rejoice in God; every one that sweareth by him shall glory: but the mouth of them that speak lies shall be stopped.
verses.verse_html: 11But the king shall rejoice in God; every one that sweareth by him shall glory: but the mouth of them that speak lies shall be stopped.
